column4: okay, this must be a really dumb question but, I've got an old PIII o' mine which is still running; think I could turn it into a server with a little mingling?
yes
I ran ubuntu-server on a PowerMac G4 400mhz =]
would it be good enough?
depends on what you want to do with it.
the biggest bottleneck will be memory, likely
'server' is a very, very wide category
thanks =) originally I was about to rip it out and have a look at it, but I think I should be getting my server before I get my new laptop
can I send you a link?
yeah I reckon lol
yup please
I just joined that website o' yours =]
LOL!
By the way - I would strongly suggest you actually get the 'server edition'
you don't need the overhead that having xwindows would cause
of course, yeah
oh?  weird
that site's been offlin e for about 4 years, heh.
Ugh, okay then, I didn't bother checking the date of the last posts lol
people are trying to revive it, so have a blast
so is THAT the performance I should be expecting? =P
heh./
